name: Sturm, Ruger & Company, Inc.
description: Sturm, Ruger & Company, Inc. is one of the largest American manufacturers of firearms, known for its commitment to quality, innovation, and safety. Founded in 1949 by William B. Ruger and Alexander McCormick Sturm, the company has built a reputation for producing a wide range of firearms including rifles, handguns, and accessories. Ruger's products are celebrated for their craftsmanship, reliability, and performance, making them a favorite among shooting enthusiasts, hunters, and law enforcement agencies. The company's extensive product line includes iconic models such as the Ruger 10/22 rifle, the Ruger SR1911 pistol, and the Ruger LCP pocket pistol. In addition to manufacturing firearms, Ruger is committed to promoting responsible gun ownership and supporting shooting sports. The company engages in various initiatives to educate the public on gun safety and advocate for the rights of gun owners. With its headquarters in Southport, Connecticut, Ruger operates manufacturing facilities across the United States, ensuring that a significant portion of its products is made domestically. Sturm, Ruger & Company, Inc. continues to be a leader in the firearms industry, combining innovation with a deep respect for tradition.
